title: Trump Pardons Anti-Immigration Democrat Rep. Henry Cuellar in Bribery Case
description: Trump baselessly claimed Joe Biden's DOJ targeted Cuellar, who was indicted last year on bribery charges.
content:
Honest, paywall-free news is rare. Please support our boldly independent journalism with a donation of any size.
